parameters:
Salaryman: Hello, Ayako-san! Are you ready for the
sales visit we're going to do now?

Salaryman: Shall we head out once you've changed?
Since the location is far, let's take the train
today.

...? Can't we use the company car for the sales
visit?

Salaryman: C...Company...car..? Ah, you mean the
car that only the top performers can use. I'm
still only allowed to use walking and trains.

Salaryman: Well, since we're running out of time,
shall we go? I'll cover the train fare since
you're helping me.

(Seems like a more intense black company than I
expected...)

Salaryman: If you can prepare quickly, I can wait
for a bit... B-but if we're late for the
appointment with the client... *trembles*
(It's probably best to not make too many jokes...)

Salaryman: Ah, Ayako-san... Thank you so much for
the other day...! Various things...

Salaryman: Please take care of me again when I go
on a business trip!

Salaryman: Um, um...! I'm about to go on a sales
visit. Are you ready...?!

Salaryman: Today's destination is far, so I'll be
heading there by train. \.\. I'll be going by
train...!
Y-Yes... (I wonder if they like trains...?)

Salaryman: I understand... \.\.\ What a shame...
\{ \} *mumbles*

Salaryman: I wonder when the next business trip
will be...\}Sigh...

Salaryman: Alright, let's go for sales! Are you
ready?
Salaryman: I see... Is that so...

Salaryman: Ah, Ayako-san... Thank you so much for
the other day...! Various things...

Salaryman: Please take care of me again when I go
on a business trip!

Salaryman: Ayako-san! Let's go to the sales
department quickly!! We must achieve 120% of the
budget this month, you know!

Salaryman: I-I mean... I'll do something about
that...! For this day, I've been taking
supplements to condition my lower body... Ah,
n-no! It's nothing!

Salaryman: I did it! My sales performance
improved, so now I can borrow a company car for
sales!

Salaryman: This performance is thanks to
Nagatsuki-san! Thank you very much!

Salaryman: Since I'm still in a lower rank, I have
to pay for the gasoline myself! But with this, my
work will be more efficient! Oh, by the way,
Ayako-san, would you like to work at my place?
Hahaha!

Confused person: I should be going up the
stairs... but I'm not making any progress...?! At
this rate... I won't be able to make it to the
office!

(Are you really that unwilling to go to work? Just
standing there, not making any progress...)
